product_overview: Single-page marketing site for a live webinar on Feb 14, 2026, designed to inform users about the webinar details and drive registrations at â‚¹499 (inclusive of GST). The product features an engaging scroll-driven hero, clear value proposition sections, and a streamlined registration flow.
core_goals: Provide a visually engaging landing page that clearly communicates the webinar's value and details.
Drive user registrations for the webinar through an intuitive and accessible registration modal.
Ensure smooth and responsive user experience across all devices, including smooth scrolling and interactive hero animations.
Maintain consistent branding and easy navigation with a sticky header and footer.
Validate and securely handle registration data, integrating with a backend Google Sheets API.
key_features: Hero section with scroll-driven canvas image sequence, headline, subtext, and dual CTAs ('Reserve my seat' and 'Scroll to know more').
Preloader displaying a black screen with logo that fades out after content readiness with a minimum display time of ~1.4 seconds.
Multiple informational sections including 'Not for', 'Why this matters', 'In 90 minutes', 'Webinar details' with date, time, format, price, and CTA.
Sticky header with branding and 'Reserve my seat' CTA that opens the registration modal.
Footer with branding and relevant external links.
Registration modal featuring form fields for name, email, and phone with submission to an API endpoint and appropriate success and error state handling.
Smooth scrolling implemented via Lenis for enhanced user experience.
Backend API to handle registration POST requests, validating inputs and appending data to a Google Sheet.
API to serve the hero image sequence URLs for preloading and animation.
Image preloader hook managing concurrent loading, progress tracking, and early-ready state for the hero images.
user_flow_summary: User lands on the home page and first sees a preloader screen with logo.
Once content is ready, the preloader fades out revealing the hero section with an interactive scroll-driven image sequence, headline, subtext, and two CTAs.
User can click 'Reserve my seat' in the hero or header or webinar details to open the registration modal.
User completes the registration form (name, email, phone) and submits.
On successful submission, user sees a thank-you or success message; on error, user is shown the error within the modal.
User can scroll down to explore additional sections: 'Not for', 'Why this matters', 'In 90 minutes', 'Webinar details'.
Scroll interactions include smooth scrolling and jump to details from the secondary CTA in hero.
Sticky header remains visible for easy navigation and quick access to registration.
Footer provides branding and external resources.
validation_criteria: All hero images load and animate correctly with smooth scroll on supported devices.
Preloader screen displays for at least 1.4 seconds and fades out only after content is fully loaded.
All 'Reserve my seat' CTAs open the registration modal reliably.
Scroll-to-details CTA scrolls smoothly to the detailed sections.
Registration form validates inputs and submits data to the backend API endpoint.
Success and error states after registration submission display correctly in the modal.
Sticky header remains visible and functional during scrolling.
Layout is responsive across desktop, tablet, and mobile viewport sizes.
Footer displays correct links and branding as specified.
Backend API successfully validates and appends registration data to Google Sheets.
Hero image URLs API returns correct ordered list for preloading and animation.
Image preloader handles concurrency and reports progress with early-ready state handling.
